original_text: The sons of Jerahmeel's brother, Caleb, were: Mesha, his firstborn son. Mesha became the father of Ziph. His son Mareshah became the father of Hebron.
korean_text: 여라므엘의 아우 갈렙의 아들 곧 맏아들은 메사이니 십의 아버지요 그 아들은 마레사니 헤브론의 아버지이며

sentences.original_text: The sons of Jerahmeel's brother, Caleb
Mesha became the father of Ziph
His son Mareshah became the father of Hebron
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 마레사는 헤브론의 아버지가 되었습니다
